name: Lightcraft Unreleased Demo
description:
Explore the never-before seen Demo of Project: Lightcraft (As seen on my profile). We never released this, due to the large amount of ■■■■■■■ nothing.

Controls: WASD - Movement, E/R - Switch between hands and walls.

This game is a part of Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 (very cool btw) with the theme: Its (not) real.
